      • engineGetEncoded

        protected byte[] engineGetEncoded(java.lang.String format)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the IV parameter spec in the specified format. Supported formats are:
        • ASN.1: returns the IV encoded as a DER-encoded ASN.1 OCTET-STRING
        • RAW: returns the RAW IV bytes, with no encoding
        • Luna: returns the IV encoded in a Luna proprietary format that is equivalent to the DER-encoded format without the initial 0x04 tag byte. This format is only used internal to the provider
        Specified by:
        engineGetEncoded in class java.security.AlgorithmParametersSpi
        Parameters:
        format - the encoding to use for the returned IV
        Returns:
        the IV parameter spec in the specified format
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • engineInit

        protected void engineInit(byte[] params)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize the parameters with an IV given as a DER-encoded ASN.1 OCTET-STRING.

      • engineInit

        protected void engineInit(byte[] params,
              java.lang.String format)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize the algorithm parameters with an IV given in the specified format. Supported formats are:
        • ASN.1: the IV is given as a DER-encoded ASN.1 OCTET-STRING
        • RAW: the IV is given as a raw byte array with no encoding
        Specified by:
        engineInit in class java.security.AlgorithmParametersSpi
        Parameters:
        params - the encoded IV
        format - the encoding used in the IV
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
